creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Covered box; knob handle, lattice and foliage design in blue-grey in panels on lid and base; pottery; stoneware with underglaze blue decor.
medium: Sawankalok ware Stoneware with underglaze brown decor
text: Excavated in the Phillipines, this covered box is typical of a type that was exported in great quantity from Sisatchanalai to markets in Indonesia and other parts of Southeast Asia.
title: Covered Box
